message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.AI 

This paper discusses the use of machine learning algorithms for exploratory data analysis of semantic drift in digital preservation. The paper also introduces a physical metaphor of gravitation to express changes in the semantic content of a vector field. This work involves natural language processing (NLP), machine learning, and data analysis, which are all relevant to the sub-categories of computational linguistics (cs.CL), information retrieval (cs.IR), machine learning (cs.LG), social and information networks (cs.SI), and artificial intelligence (cs.AI).
